errors.max-invalid: Value must be less than maximum number {{max}}

home.title: Platform for analysis and consultation of administrative transparency of Public Administrations
home.subtitle1: The objective is to design, develop, experiment and evaluate innovative digital technologies for the recovery, classification and interpretation, in automated mode, of information that may flow into the Unified Transparency Platform, as well as the accessory and complementary services related to it.
home.subtitle2: Develop technological solutions aimed at distributed data collection and valorization of documentary heritage; technology transfer; as well as all activities functional to pursuing the objectives of the CNR - ANAC Memorandum of Understanding.
home.header1: Presence of the Transparent Administration section in Homepage

company.title: Memorandum of understanding between the National Anti-Corruption Authority and the National Research Council - August 7, 2023

header.title: TrasparenzAI
header.subtitle: Platform for analysis and consultation of administrative transparency of Public Administrations

footer.first: Project for the experimentation of innovative digital technologies for automatic analysis of the Transparent Administration section of Public Administration websites and legal entities that fall within the scope of Legislative Decree no. 33/2013.
footer.second: The architecture of the implemented platform is composed of many integrated components, this repository contains documentation of the general architecture, individual components and validation results obtained.

signin.title: Access personal area
signin.unauthorized: Wrong username and/or password, use the username assigned during registration and not the email address.
signin.manuale: For more information consult the "Access / registration in procedure" chapter of the User Manual.

new_registration.title: New Registration
new_registration.requisiti:
New registration requires, for Italian users, name, surname, username and password, tax code and an email address (exclusively NOT PEC); for foreign users, instead of the tax code, it is required to enter gender, date of birth and foreign state.

An automatic email with a link to "click" within one hour of receipt will be sent to the email address indicated during registration to complete user activation. After one hour from receipt, the user account is deleted, therefore the registration procedure must be repeated from scratch.

By clicking on the User Activation link contained in the email, registration is completed and the procedure access page is presented.
After accessing the procedure, a new menu with your name is activated through which it is possible to view and/or modify your personal settings and it is possible to disconnect from the application.

information.title: Account information
information.detail: Personal information can be changed at any time, if the user account does not come from a SPID account or from the CNR centralized user system. Changes to information are not reflected on applications already sent or in provisional status, in which case a change in personal data must be promptly communicated by opening a report
